'''Vaneigem''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Hotel Debord]], [[Court of Fontaine]], [[Fontaine]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player three [[Ile flottante]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Vaneigem:''' Fine art and good food. Ah, what a wonderful life...
:{{DIcon}} Hello there.
::'''Vaneigem:''' It is a pleasure to have met you on this fine day, dear guest. My name is Vaneigem, and I am the owner of this establishment.
::'''Vaneigem:''' If you have any comments or suggestions regarding the menu or performances, please do speak your mind. I will do my best to provide you with more comprehensive services.
:{{DIcon}} Tell me about art...
::'''Vaneigem:''' As you know, we often invite artists to perform here at our restaurant. The most popular of these are the magical performers Mr. Lyney and Ms. Lynette.
::'''Vaneigem:''' "Art is the key ingredient in fine dining" &mdash; this is something that I believe in most strongly, and I hope that the cultural atmosphere here shall spread far and wide.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Impressive.
::'''Vaneigem:''' Thank you so much for your appreciation, dear guest. If you don't mind, please accept this sweet treat as a personal thank-you gift.
::'''Vaneigem:''' Enjoy your meal.
::;Obtain {{Item|Ile flottante|x=3}}
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Vaneigem:''' Farewell, dear guest. I hope that Hotel Debord shall leave you with wondrous memories.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* Vaneigem is named after {{w|Raoul Vaneigem}}, a Belgian writer known writing one of the two most influential texts of the {{w|Situationist International|Situationist movement}}, the other being written by {{w|Guy Debord}}, for whom Hotel Debord is named.
* {{Furnishing Mentions}}
